body.p: March 9, 1939, Our Friend Charles Lowe Cloud, We see by the Banner, that you are sick. We are very sorry and hope you are much better and will soon be home. When we get the Banner we always look for Indian News first to see how you all are, and we are sorry that Henry Mike is sick too. And we hope he is better. Very sincerely your friends, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Rundle
